page.title: 14Entertainment in Ryhope
page.content: We did a survey of what our area offers us in our{leisure time.}The biggest places we have are a {recreation park}which has got tennis courts and bowling greens and a large {playing field}with a set of swings and slides near by. We have a good{community centre which has got things like a karate club, ladies' keep-fit, indoor bowls, first aid training, a play group, a youth club and disco dancing. Some of us enjoy watching{sport}- there are two local football teams and a cricket team. The cricket team has a junior section and boys can join from about the age of nine. A new{golf {course}is being built and many of us want to become members. We all like going to the{beach}and we often see people there sea-angling.
